I’ve tried to locate a better place to post...to no avail. Just FEEDBACK. We have been buying towels at Costco for years. You recently switched from Charisma to (apparently) a woman owned business. Probably part of your DEI effort. I really don’t care one way or the other, BUT: The new towels are terrible. They keep giving off colors (30 days after buying) and one of the towels shredded on the sides. I go to Costco for one reason: Value. I suspect that’s why most people go. We will certainly NOT buy those towels again...and strongly suggest you find another vendor. Just my two cents.
